about_the_game:
This is an official BGM asset for action games in Pixel Game Maker MV with a pop sound.
Get ready to infuse your games with original and vibrant music!

■ This is an electro sound created with Cubase Pro 12.
Composed by modeP from [one of modesty].

■ Unleash the power of unique music that stands out from the crowd!

■ Perfectly suited for action-packed games with a pop or comical twist.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------


BGM (7 tracks)

ogg files: 7

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
